Hi ${requester},
Unfortunately your request to access the MM Jumpbox has been rejected.
The following comments were given by ${approver} about the rejection: ${Rejectresponse}
Please resolve any issues with your request and then re-submit.
Do not respond to this email as this email address is not monitored.
Thanks, MMEM IT Team.

Hi ${requester},
Unfortunately your request to access the MM Jumpbox has been rejected.
The following comments were given by ${approver} about the rejection: ${Rejectresponse}
Please resolve any issues with your request and then re-submit.
Do not respond to this email as this email address is not monitored.
Thanks, MMEM IT Team.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer = current.email_address;
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
